title: Welcome to Hell
description: "Good morning. Welcome to HELL."Mel hates job interviews â€“ and this one's shaping up to be the interview from Hell. From the grumpy receptionist to the disturbingly demonic interview panel and the sleazy CEO, it seems landing her first job is the least of Mel's worries. Can she make it out of the office alive without selling her soul?
author: Demelza Carlton
